modules.description: This module detects the tempo of audio data in beats per minute (BPM). It processes audio samples in either Bigarray or nested array format, supporting multi-channel input at a specified sample rate. Use it to analyze live or recorded audio for rhythmic tempo estimation.

This module processes audio data to adjust tempo, pitch, or playback rate, using a provided number of channels and sample rate. It includes a tempo detection submodule that analyzes audio in Bigarray or nested array format to estimate beats per minute (BPM), supporting multi-channel input at a specified sample rate. The main module accepts interleaved or non-interleaved audio samples, manipulates them according to set parameters, and outputs the modified samples. Use it for real-time audio effects, music remixing, speech processing, or rhythmic analysis in live or recorded audio.
